title: Advice that would Benefit us for Dunya & Akhirah? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: faizan from india yes actually i'm a medical student studying medicine so this year i am graduating in sheldon inshallah so i need a few advices that would benefit me in the hereafter and in this world as well in a q a it's difficult you know that it's not a place for lecturing fear allah azzawajal lower your gaze don't free mix with opposite gender always try to excel in your work and do it for the sake of allah and try to give and leave a good impression about muslims and try to be the best in whatever you do you
